file.name: complex_type.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: "Complex Object Api"
  version: 0.0.0
paths:
  /user:
    get:
      description: "A description"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Created
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'

components:
  schemas:
    Person:
      type: object
      properties:
        DNI:
          type: string
    User:
      type: object
      properties:
        name:
          type: string
          pattern: ([\u30a0-\u30ff]+)
          example: キンギョ
        age:
          type: integer
          format: int64
          example: 1
        ContactInfo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/ContactInfo'
    ContactInfo:
      type: object
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
          format: email
        phone:
          type: string

Error: buildIR: make ir: path "/user": get: responses: 200: contents: application/json: schema: field name: string validator: pattern: error parsing regexp: invalid escape sequence: `\u`
